title: Case of the Missing Puffles
description:
AUNT ARCTIC, FAMOUS REPORTER FOR
THE CLUB PENGUIN TIMES, IS VERY
UPSET, BECAUSE TWO OF HER PET
PUFFLES ARE MISSING! WILL YOU TAKE
THE CHALLENGE OF RESCUING THEM?

title: G's Secret Mission
description:
G, THE BRILLIANT INVENTOR FOR THE
PENGUIN SECRET AGENCY, NEEDS
YOUR HELP WITH ONE OF HIS NEWEST
PROJECTS. WHAT COULD G BE UP TO
NOW?

title: Case of the Missing Coins
description:
THE COINS FROM THE VAULT IN THE
GIFT SHOP HAVE MYSTERIOUSLY
GONE MISSING. WILL YOU HELP FIND
THEM AND SOLVE THE MYSTERY?

title: Avalanche Rescue
description:
THERE HAS BEEN AN AVALANCHE ON
THE SKI HILL, AND YOUR HELP IS
NEEDED. WILL YOU ANSWER THE CALL?

title: Secret of the Fur
description:
THE MYSTERY OF THE FUR REMAINS
UNSOLVED. WILL YOU HELP G TO
UNRAVEL ITS SECRET?

title: Questions for a Crab
description:
MANY QUESTIONS REMAIN THAT ONLY
A CRAB CAN ANSWER.

title: Clockwork Repairs
description:
THE CLOCK TOWER NEEDS REPAIR, AND
G NEEDS YOUR HELP.  CAN YOU FIX IT
IN TIME?

title: Mysterious Tremors
description:
TERRIBLE TREMORS HAVE BEEN
SHAKING THINGS UP AROUND THE
ISLAND. CAN YOU SOLVE THIS
MYSTERIOUS MENACE?

title: Operation: Spy & Seek
description:
YOUâ€™VE BEEN CONTACTED FOR A
SPECIAL MISSION TO TRACK DOWN
HERBERT. CAN YOU BEAR DOWN ON HIS
LOCATION?

title: Waddle Squad
description:
THE PSA NEEDS YOU FOR A SPECIAL
TEAM MISSION. CAN YOU WORK WELL
WITH OTHERS?

title: The Veggie Villain
description:
ANOTHER INCIDENT HAS BEEN
REPORTED INVOLVING HERBERT P.
BEAR. ARE YOU READY FOR THE BIG
SHOWDOWN?
